title: 316: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (Narcissism, Lying, & Kissing Techniques)
itunes:title: 316: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (Narcissism, Lying, & Kissing Techniques)
description:
(CW: Discussing Jamie’s story involving suicide and suicidal ideation) The Broads are back to recap Michelle’s latest episode - but first they chat about the new Bachelor news and Katie/Blake’s breakup. Then they dive into this episode already packed with drama and chemistry! They chat the incredible child actors, Will calling Peter a narcissist, Peter’s reaction, thoughts on everything Jamie, Nayte's kissing technique, learning more about Joe, falling for Mollique, PJ’s exit, and much more!
